plot: The budding friendship between an idealistic painter and a teenage street hustler is haunted by addiction and sexual obsession in this short film, set against the New York City underground rave scene.
title: Red Light August
plot_es: The budding friendship between an idealistic painter and a teenage street hustler is haunted by addiction and sexual obsession in this short film, set against the New York City underground rave scene.
plot_en: The budding friendship between an idealistic painter and a teenage street hustler is haunted by addiction and sexual obsession in this short film, set against the New York City underground rave scene.
